title: Skill Affinity: Fire
description: You are guaranteed to be offered only skills that contain the type Fire the first time you are offered active skills, if possible. If you have multiple affinities, the will happen on at a time

title: Skill Mastery: Fire
description: Adds upp to 6 random Active Skills of type Fire that your character would not have access to otherwise to the skill pool, if possible

title: Skill Inclination: Fire
description: Increases the chance that active skills of type Fire will be offered to you when you level up

title: Recklessness
description: Increases all damage you cause by 0,5% per missing health point

title: Executioner
description: You cause 5,0% extra damage per different type of negative effect on enemies you hit

title: Commanding Presence
description: Reduces all damage you deal by 40,0%, but increases the damage modifier of all units summoned by you by 40,0%

title: Multi Cast Mastery
description: Increases the chance for long chains of multi-casting to happen

title: Center of Attention
description: All of your own random targeted area effects are now targeted at your position instead

title: Synergetic
description: Increases the chance of being offered synergy power-ups where applying one ngeative effect can chain and apply another, and increase the chances of those synergies happening by 20,0%

title: Dash Mastery
description: Increases your dash speed by 50,0% , resulting ina longer distance traveled

title: Reroll Mastery
description: You gain one extra reroll every 5 levels

title: Singlar Focus
description: Skills can now be picked multiple times. Power-ups that enchance a specific skill, will be applied to a random instance of the skill.

title: Surefooted
description: You take 15,0% less damage from all sources and you are also much more resistant to pushback

title: Weapon Expert
description: You start the game with the special weapon skill for your currently selected weapon

title: Critical Mastery
description: 100,0% of your critical chance is added to your critical damage multiplier when calculating critical damage

title: Controlled Chaos
description: For all your abilities that deal a random amount of damage, damage will be rolled twice and the highest roll will be chosen

title: Generalist
description: you cause 5,0% extra damage for each different type your currently active skills have.

title: Purity
description: Increases all damage cause by 50,0%. This bonus is reduced by 5,0% for each different type of negative effect on the target.

title: Focus Fire
description: Increases all damage you deal by 40,0% but decreases the area of all your skills by 20,0%
